mapper.insert: insert into kpg_task( name, kpg_algorithm, kpg_key_amount, task_status, task_start_time, task_notes, exe_task_start_time, exe_task_end_time, dbcommit_bufsize, generated_key_amount, task_exe_result )values( #{name}, #{keyPairAlgorithm.id}, #{kpgKeyAmount}, #{taskStatus.id}, #{taskStartTime}, #{taskNotes}, #{exeTaskStartTime}, #{exeTaskEndTime}, #{dbCommitBufsize.id}, #{generatedKeyAmount}, #{taskExeResult} )
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id AS id, t1. NAME AS NAME, t1.kpg_algorithm AS keyPairAlgorithm, t1.kpg_key_amount AS kpgKeyAmount, t1.task_status AS taskStatus, t1.task_start_time AS taskStartTime, t1.task_notes AS taskNotes, t1.exe_task_start_time AS exeTaskStartTime, t1.exe_task_end_time AS exeTaskEndTime, t1.dbcommit_bufsize AS dbCommitBufsize, t1.generated_key_amount generatedKeyAmount, t1.task_exe_result AS taskExeResult, t2.id AS kpgAlgId, t2. NAME AS algName, t2.alg_oid AS algorithmOid, t2.alg_name AS algorithmName, t2.keysize AS keysize, t2.notes AS notes, t2.is_valid AS isValid, t3.id AS SysCodeId, t3.para_code AS paraCode, t3.para_value AS paraValue, t3.para_type AS paraType, t3.is_valid AS SysIsValid, t3.notes AS SysNotes, t5.id AS SysCodeIdDb, t5.para_code AS paraCodeDb, t5.para_value AS paraValueDb, t5.para_type AS paraTypeDb, t5.is_valid AS SysIsValidDb, t5.notes AS SysNotesDb, t4.id AS TypeId, t4.para_type AS typeParaType, t4.notes AS typeNotes, t6.id AS TypeIdDb, t6.para_type AS typeParaTypeDb, t6.notes AS typeNotesDb FROM kpg_task t1, keypair_algorithm t2, sys_code t3, sys_param_type t4, sys_code t5, sys_param_type t6 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm = t2.id AND t3.para_type = t4.id AND t5.para_type = t6.id AND t1.task_status = t3.id AND t1.dbcommit_bufsize = t5.id limit #{start},#{length}

select count(*) from kpg_task t1,keypair_algorithm t2,sys_code t3,sys_param_type t4,sys_code t5,sys_param_type t6 where t1.kpg_algorithm=t2.id and t3.para_type=t4.id and t5.para_type=t6.id and t1.task_status=t3.para_value and t1.dbcommit_bufsize = t5.para_value

SELECT t1.id AS id, t1. NAME AS NAME, t1.kpg_algorithm AS keyPairAlgorithm, t1.kpg_key_amount AS kpgKeyAmount, t1.task_status AS taskStatus, t1.task_start_time AS taskStartTime, t1.task_notes AS taskNotes, t1.exe_task_start_time AS exeTaskStartTime, t1.exe_task_end_time AS exeTaskEndTime, t1.dbcommit_bufsize AS dbCommitBufsize, t1.generated_key_amount generatedKeyAmount, t1.task_exe_result AS taskExeResult, t2.id AS kpgAlgId, t2. NAME AS algName, t2.alg_oid AS algorithmOid, t2.alg_name AS algorithmName, t2.keysize AS keysize, t2.notes AS notes, t2.is_valid AS isValid, t3.id AS SysCodeId, t3.para_code AS paraCode, t3.para_value AS paraValue, t3.para_type AS paraType, t3.is_valid AS SysIsValid, t3.notes AS SysNotes, t5.id AS SysCodeIdDb, t5.para_code AS paraCodeDb, t5.para_value AS paraValueDb, t5.para_type AS paraTypeDb, t5.is_valid AS SysIsValidDb, t5.notes AS SysNotesDb, t4.id AS TypeId, t4.para_type AS typeParaType, t4.notes AS typeNotes, t6.id AS TypeIdDb, t6.para_type AS typeParaTypeDb, t6.notes AS typeNotesDb FROM kpg_task t1, keypair_algorithm t2, sys_code t3, sys_param_type t4, sys_code t5, sys_param_type t6 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm = t2.id AND t3.para_type = t4.id AND t5.para_type = t6.id AND t1.task_status = t3.id AND t1.dbcommit_bufsize = t5.id AND t1.id=#{id}

SELECT t1.id AS id, t1. NAME AS NAME, t1.kpg_algorithm AS keyPairAlgorithm, t1.kpg_key_amount AS kpgKeyAmount, t1.task_status AS taskStatus, t1.task_start_time AS taskStartTime, t1.task_notes AS taskNotes, t1.exe_task_start_time AS exeTaskStartTime, t1.exe_task_end_time AS exeTaskEndTime, t1.dbcommit_bufsize AS dbCommitBufsize, t1.generated_key_amount generatedKeyAmount, t1.task_exe_result AS taskExeResult, t2.id AS kpgAlgId, t2. NAME AS algName, t2.alg_oid AS algorithmOid, t2.alg_name AS algorithmName, t2.keysize AS keysize, t2.notes AS notes, t2.is_valid AS isValid, t3.id AS SysCodeId, t3.para_code AS paraCode, t3.para_value AS paraValue, t3.para_type AS paraType, t3.is_valid AS SysIsValid, t3.notes AS SysNotes, t5.id AS SysCodeIdDb, t5.para_code AS paraCodeDb, t5.para_value AS paraValueDb, t5.para_type AS paraTypeDb, t5.is_valid AS SysIsValidDb, t5.notes AS SysNotesDb, t4.id AS TypeId, t4.para_type AS typeParaType, t4.notes AS typeNotes, t6.id AS TypeIdDb, t6.para_type AS typeParaTypeDb, t6.notes AS typeNotesDb FROM kpg_task t1, keypair_algorithm t2, sys_code t3, sys_param_type t4, sys_code t5, sys_param_type t6 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm = t2.id AND t3.para_type = t4.id AND t5.para_type = t6.id AND t1.task_status = t3.id AND t1.dbcommit_bufsize = t5.id AND t1.name=#{name}

SELECT t1.id AS id, t1. NAME AS NAME, t1.kpg_algorithm AS keyPairAlgorithm, t1.kpg_key_amount AS kpgKeyAmount, t1.task_status AS taskStatus, t1.task_start_time AS taskStartTime, t1.task_notes AS taskNotes, t1.exe_task_start_time AS exeTaskStartTime, t1.exe_task_end_time AS exeTaskEndTime, t1.dbcommit_bufsize AS dbCommitBufsize, t1.generated_key_amount generatedKeyAmount, t1.task_exe_result AS taskExeResult, t2.id AS kpgAlgId, t2. NAME AS algName, t2.alg_oid AS algorithmOid, t2.alg_name AS algorithmName, t2.keysize AS keysize, t2.notes AS notes, t2.is_valid AS isValid, t3.id AS SysCodeId, t3.para_code AS paraCode, t3.para_value AS paraValue, t3.para_type AS paraType, t3.is_valid AS SysIsValid, t3.notes AS SysNotes, t5.id AS SysCodeIdDb, t5.para_code AS paraCodeDb, t5.para_value AS paraValueDb, t5.para_type AS paraTypeDb, t5.is_valid AS SysIsValidDb, t5.notes AS SysNotesDb, t4.id AS TypeId, t4.para_type AS typeParaType, t4.notes AS typeNotes, t6.id AS TypeIdDb, t6.para_type AS typeParaTypeDb, t6.notes AS typeNotesDb FROM kpg_task t1, keypair_algorithm t2, sys_code t3, sys_param_type t4, sys_code t5, sys_param_type t6 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm = t2.id AND t3.para_type = t4.id AND t5.para_type = t6.id AND t1.task_status = t3.id AND t1.dbcommit_bufsize = t5.id and task_start_time <=#{taskStartTime}

SELECT t1.id AS id, t1. NAME AS NAME, t1.kpg_algorithm AS keyPairAlgorithm, t1.kpg_key_amount AS kpgKeyAmount, t1.task_status AS taskStatus, t1.task_start_time AS taskStartTime, t1.task_notes AS taskNotes, t1.exe_task_start_time AS exeTaskStartTime, t1.exe_task_end_time AS exeTaskEndTime, t1.dbcommit_bufsize AS dbCommitBufsize, t1.generated_key_amount generatedKeyAmount, t1.task_exe_result AS taskExeResult, t2.id AS kpgAlgId, t2. NAME AS algName, t2.alg_oid AS algorithmOid, t2.alg_name AS algorithmName, t2.keysize AS keysize, t2.notes AS notes, t2.is_valid AS isValid, t3.id AS SysCodeId, t3.para_code AS paraCode, t3.para_value AS paraValue, t3.para_type AS paraType, t3.is_valid AS SysIsValid, t3.notes AS SysNotes, t5.id AS SysCodeIdDb, t5.para_code AS paraCodeDb, t5.para_value AS paraValueDb, t5.para_type AS paraTypeDb, t5.is_valid AS SysIsValidDb, t5.notes AS SysNotesDb, t4.id AS TypeId, t4.para_type AS typeParaType, t4.notes AS typeNotes, t6.id AS TypeIdDb, t6.para_type AS typeParaTypeDb, t6.notes AS typeNotesDb FROM kpg_task t1, keypair_algorithm t2, sys_code t3, sys_param_type t4, sys_code t5, sys_param_type t6 WHERE t1.kpg_algorithm = t2.id AND t3.para_type = t4.id AND t5.para_type = t6.id AND t1.task_status = t3.id AND t1.dbcommit_bufsize = t5.id and task_status=#{codeId}
mapper.update: update kpg_task set name = #{name}, kpg_algorithm = #{keyPairAlgorithm.id}, kpg_key_amount=#{kpgKeyAmount}, task_status=#{taskStatus.id}, task_start_time=#{taskStartTime}, task_notes=#{taskNotes}, exe_task_start_time=#{exeTaskStartTime}, exe_task_end_time=#{exeTaskEndTime}, dbcommit_bufsize=#{dbCommitBufsize.id}, generated_key_amount=#{generatedKeyAmount}, task_exe_result=#{taskExeResult} where id=#{id}
